response.overview: In a world where technology and magic have merged, a young girl Elmira discovers unusual site features from the depths of the Internet. Traveling through virtual worlds, she reveals her incredible connection to cyberspace and finds herself at the forefront of the battle for the future of humanity. She has to make a decision that will change her life and the world around her. With the forces of artificial intelligence on his side, she becomes the last hope of the worlds to escape from darkness and destruction. Will she be able to overcome evil and protect the boundaries of reality from otherworldly threats?
response.title: Qumalaq
